评论详情: I was looking for something for multiple ladies to wear for a historical museum event costume. This has laces on the sides like mini corsets. This has fit a small child all the way up to a plus sized woman and it always looked fairly flawess. The fabric is a little less luxe up close, but from a distance no one would ever know.
Really nicely made!
This is a quality dress for the price and fits true to size.
Great quality for the price! I ordered it to wear to the Era's tour as an Evermore dress and it was spot on what I needed. super comfortable and better quality than expected.
This was surprising well made, and perfect for our party. Sadly I did not keep since it did flatter my body.
Well constructed- Gives the perfect creepy school marm look but doesn’t breathe well at all. Don’t think it would be smart of anyone to use with petticoats. Lady bits might die of heat stroke.

I ordered this in hopes I’d get it for Halloween to mimic Taylor Swift’s dress in the “Fortnight” video. The dress did not come in time but I tried it on today and the dress is beautiful, fits wonderful and is great quality. Paired with a petticoat it will be perfect for next year. Could even pair it with a black veil for a general scary Victorian look.
The fabric is sturdy, the zipper is great and the size was perfect. I bought a 3X and it fit perfectly. I'm 5'6" and the length with heels was the right length. Definitely worth the price.

i swear, i was kinda scared because giving the details of my measurements was not an easy task but GEEZ, THIS DRESS IS LOVELY! i absolutely LOVED IT as u can see in my instagram pictures below ❤️😩 and it fits perfectly! totally worth

I'm 5'6", 175 lbs, ordered size XL. I was extremely happy with the design and structure of this 19th century costume. I wore it for a cemetery tour that I was performing in. Got a lot of compliments. It was very comfortable. I did purchase a wired hoop skirt to go under the dress.

It is not true to size. I sized up just to be roomier and it fits like normal - so it runs a tad small. It is great quality though. There is ribbon on the sides to cinch in the waist which I thought was a nice add on - though it could probably snap if cinched too much. All in all - a great find.

评论概述: Runs true to size so I ordered it too large.
评论详情: Plan to use for victorian tea.  Very good quality.  My error on size, will try to exchange.Using worth 3 hoop slip and gorgeous!!
Bought this for an Elphaba costume. It’s nice and stretchy. Decent construction. Absolutely terrifying! Good value. Wish it had hidden pockets!
The Swifty in my life wants to be the character from the new Taylor Swift Fortnight video, and this dress will be so PERFECT! Super impressed with the quality and the price.
Dress does not feel like a cotton blend- feels more like a polyester halloween costume. Cannot find material composition in the dress or care instruction tag.

Not cotton…synthetic and somewhat stretchy. Looks pretty good but could use better detailing on the front…also the synthetic material makes it a bit droopy as opposed to the real cotton ones from the Victorian/Edwardian era.
Bought this for a play.  My actress loves it.  It is lightweight and with the lacing on the sides, it is adjustable for various waist sizes.  Lots of compliments on this dress.
Love this dress!! Very well made.

This dress was exactly what I was expecting. I got it a size up just in case but I really didn't need to. Thankfully it tightens. I'm short so it is a bit long, but I have to deal with that for all my clothes. Excited to wear it during Halloween season!

Material is nice not to much stretch but fits the body with ease. No need to size up. Love the whole look of the dress it's self just that time era something about the design that's really eye popping!! Not transparent so you can wear other stuff under if you wish. An ya get what ya paid for like this is a really nice dress!!!

I wear this type of dresses in my everyday life, at Church most of all. The dress is comfortable for this purpose and very soft. The size fit perfectly. I completely love that it is full length (it is so sad that nowadays that type of real full length is so hard to find!). I hope to purchase more, I hope to find more diversity from this seller in the future because I would be a returning customer and I believe many of my friends would purchase as they cherish this style as well. Thank you!
